original_title: In These Parkas We Can Only Be Warm
overview: Two parka-adorned silhouettes engage in a barely-audible conversation about Snapchat, grades, money, and other unintelligible topics, until one notices something on the other's glasses. It is not ice.
tagline: That's why I was hoping that you would get good grades.
title: In These Parkas We Can Only Be Warm
